title: Can't submit more logs about my screen being stuck black after champ select.
body: Submitted a ticket but I can not add more files to those that have already been submitted. My problem is after champ select the screen becomes stuck completely black unable to tab out. I have uninstalled, reinstalled, troubleshot, restarted the computer, updated the mac os to sierra, but nothing has changed the situation and allowed me to play a game. I have tried pvp and custom games and they both do the same black screen. I have also tried two different internet networks that are reliable and have been used in the past to play.

replies.body: It sounds like our tech team will have more than enough context if you've maxed out attachments.  :P  I can definitely understand the urgency though, and I may be able to help in the meantime.  This black screen usually happens if your connection is struggling to reach our services, so it's failing to download assets.  You should go over each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot and rule out possibilities, if not entirely resolve the issue!

This black screen usually happens if your connection is struggling to reach our services, so it's failing to download assets.  You should go over each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot and rule out possibilities, if not entirely resolve the issue!

After some button mashing I found pressing enter works. How lucky of me. I am in game now.
